net.wesjd.anvilgui.version

Interface VersionWrapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Wrapper1_10_R1, Wrapper1_11_R1, Wrapper1_12_R1, Wrapper1_8_R1, Wrapper1_8_R2, Wrapper1_8_R3, Wrapper1_9_R1, Wrapper1_9_R2

    public interface VersionWrapper
    Wraps versions to be able to easily use different NMS server versions
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wesley Smith
